# galaxy_policy (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `description` (String) Policy description (read only)
- `name` (String) Policy name (read only)
- `predicate` (String) Policy predicate (read only)
- `role_id` (String) Enabling role id (read only)
- `scopes` (Attributes List) Policy scopes (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--scopes))

### Optional

- `expiration` (String) Policy expiration (read only)

### Read-Only

- `created` (String) Created on (read only)
- `modified` (String) Modified on (read only)
- `policy_id` (String) Policy ID (read only)

<a id="nestedatt--scopes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `scopes`

Required:

- `column_mask_ids` (List of String) The column masks which apply to this policy scope.
- `entity_id` (String) Entity ID
- `entity_kind` (String) Entity kind
- `row_filter_ids` (List of String) Row filters

Optional:

- `column_name` (String) Column name
- `privileges` (Attributes) Privileges (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--scopes--privileges))
- `schema_name` (String) Schema name
- `table_name` (String) Table name

<a id="nestedatt--scopes--privileges"></a>
### Nested Schema for `scopes.privileges`

Required:

- `grant_kind` (String) Grant kind (read only)
- `privilege` (List of String) Privileges (read only)
